body:
Comment 7: 
dustyisawilson,

Can you, please, show us a small example program, where you think it matters for
LookupSRV to return net.DNSError and not something else. I am still puzzled about your
reasoning. Thank you.

I can see dave's point about it having 'temporary' flag, but I am not sure, if that can
be provided on windows. Even on non-windows, it could be a fickle - misconfigured DNS
could be a 'temporary' thing until responsible person fixes it. :-)

Alex
